short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily add a place or idea to your Hipherd travel board in just one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you looking for inspiration for your next trip and want to save what you find? Or maybe you found a cool spot that you want to save for later?

With the hipherd extension, you can add new places, experiences, or ideas to your travel board -- from any website at any time.Whether you're on a Yelp page, reading a blog article, or sifting through top 10 lists, we'll automatically pull data from your current webpage so you can plan, take notes, and organize your next trip. 

Features
- Add a place to any of your travel boards
- Automatically pull data on a popular site you're visiting
- Highlight and save notes from text snippets

Try Hipherd on the web at: https://hipherd.com
Create a new board on Hipherd at: https://trip.new
